content.text: Match ends, Manchester United 2, Brighton and Hove Albion 0.
Second Half ends, Manchester United 2, Brighton and Hove Albion 0.
Attempt saved. Pascal Groß (Brighton and Hove Albion) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Beram Kayal.
Attempt saved. Pascal Groß (Brighton and Hove Albion) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Glenn Murray.
